response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value to us and has the potential to significantly benefit you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1,350,000. This is an opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a competitive rate, tailored to maximize your satisfaction and return on investment. We believe this price reflects the true value of the product while allowing you to secure it before it might be priced higher in the future. We look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your needs and goals. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us. Thank you for considering our offer.", "product_price": 1350000}
